entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Val-des-Monts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:11 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero with frost.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero with frost. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of wet flurries or rain showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of wet flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
